author: schor
msg: UIMA-284: renamed a lock to indicate what field it was guarding,
made a variable that could be set/read on different threads
but was not guarded otherwise, volatile, and eliminated a race
condition by moving a test of a guarded value under the guard.

msg: UIMA-284: Added missing notifyAll to the enqueue, and renamed
